website_summaries.verdict: Works with any model of laptop, but Apple MacBook users especially love this sturdy yet simple stand.
pros: 3 color options that match the colors of Apple notebook models
Extremely sturdy build quality using a single piece of aluminum
The metal in the stand also serves to cool the laptop
Works with any model of laptop less than 10.4 inches in depth
cons: Rubber pads may not stay in place, which could cause a laptop to fall off

customer_reviews.title: Great Macbook Pro stand
customer_reviews.text: I really like this stand! It suits my 15" Macbook Pro perfectly. Nice matching aluminum material. Very solid. Even with the clear shell I have on the Mac. It keepa my mac safe above my bar surface. Its almost worh getting as an insurance policy against spills. I added a bluray drive and USB/card reader port to the underside... so it is more of a utility dock now. Great setup!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this stand!
customer_reviews.text: Not only is this stand stylish (it seem like something Apple would make), but it is at a great height and incline for typing, and there is plenty of space underneath my laptop to store my external hard drive... the cat also likes to lay under there. :) I highly recommend this product. UPDATE (2-22-18): I'm still using and loving this stand, although the cat no longer fits under it so easily.
customer_reviews.author: libu1968

customer_reviews.title: Product has a known defect that Rain Design refuses to fix
customer_reviews.text: When the rubber bumpers on my stand fell off, I contacted Rain Design's customer service about it. Their response was, "unfortunately after time the pads do fall off" and then suggested I pay $6 to buy additional bumpers from them. The mstand is a premium product, costing twice that of the Amazon brand laptop stand. If the manufacturer knows that the bumpers will fall off, they should fix the adhesive that they use instead of expecting customers to continually pay them for new bumpers.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Park

customer_reviews.title: I had same problem as many others giving this product ...
customer_reviews.text: I had same problem as many others giving this product one star--the rubber strips designed to hold the laptop in place come off after a short time. I came home once to find my laptop had fallen off the stand and onto the floor because the grips don't stay in place. By the way, I live alone and have no cat or dog, so no it wasn't knocked off by another person or a pet. Do not buy this product if you value your laptop!
customer_reviews.author: Phil Sudan

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE of USED purchase of this.
customer_reviews.text: Beware if you purchase a USED version of this stand. Arrived today but had a cheaper steel amazon brand stand inside the Rain design Mstand box. Someone was naughty on their return.... Very disappointed it wasn't picked up when it was restocked. This would've been my second Rain Design Brand stand since i was extremely happy with the first one i bought a few months ago. Would've rated it 5 stars if correct stand was inside. Hopefully this will now be figured out in returns so it doesn't happen to someone else.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect stand for my MacBook Pro!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product! I bought this for my home recording studio so that I could have my 15" MacBook Pro behind my midi keyboard. This stand is a perfect match to my MacBook Pro and the quality is excellent. For me it was just the right height so that it clears my midi keyboard :)
customer_reviews.author: MyRod

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this laptop stand because I am was getting tired of looking down at my laptop screen, it was hurting my neck. Now it actually has helped me create a better setup, because my laptop is elevated and when I plug in my external monitor I can use the laptop screen at the same time, increasing my desktop space and increasing productivity since the screens are much closer to the same height now. I also like the cord management, it helps keep things cleaner. The space underneath works great to hold other things like my ipad when not in use, so my deskptop is less cluttered. I bought the one that does not swivel, its pretty sturdy and solid.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Really happy with the product. The good: - Color matches my mac perfectly - It raises the screen to an ideal height for meetings. - The rotation is smooth - The cable organizer is basically a hole but sure you could technically have a better organization of the cables. The bad: - It's a bit pricey and with a bigger computer such as an Acer might not be as stable. I would say overall for a $10 difference the 360 is a better option specially if you want to use it for meetings. Click the button if this review helped you at all :)
customer_reviews.author: E&J

customer_reviews.title: Quality Control & “Used”?
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to give this review 3 stars, but I can’t... I mean how hard is it to quality check your products before you ship them out? My stand was fine in the aspect of coloring (space gray). It did match my MacBook Pro (15in Latest Model), but the pads on the bottom of the stand look like they were removed and then pasted on again - in the wrong spot. You can see exposed glue and it just ruins the quality for me. If it wasn’t for this then I probably would have kept it, but I can’t get that quality aspect out of my mind. It felt “used” to me.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan

customer_reviews.title: Love the look and feel of this stand
customer_reviews.text: Really impressed with the sturdiness and aesthetics of this stand. I purchased it work my 2019 macbook pro in space gray and it has excellent build quality. While the height isn't adjustable, it puts the computer in a great ergonomic position on my desk. The space gray color is an exact match to my computer, which really sets it apart from other laptop stands I've owned in the past. It's heavy and sturdy feeling without being too clunky or cumbersome. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Victor

customer_reviews.title: This is pretty useful! I use this in my home office ...
customer_reviews.text: This is pretty useful! I use this in my home office with a Macbook Pro 15" and it fits firmly without sliding around. The aluminum has just a little give to it so if you use the laptop keyboard, you might get annoyed with the vibration of the screen as you type. I'm primarily using a USB keyboard with it (it's all about those cherry blue switches!) so I'm not running into that problem. The cavity underneath is useful for routing device charging cables, KVM switch, etc. Way better than running a laptop straight on the desk. It could do with a bit more structural rigidity to keep the screen from vibrating under use.
customer_reviews.author: Magnus

customer_reviews.title: Rock Solid Stand
customer_reviews.text: I love this, using it as a desktop/second monitor for over 2 years. The stand is solid, holds a heavier 15" Macbook Pro stable and sturdy. I added two rubber pads on the front lip because the included rubber wore off in the heat over time (they became slippery and sticky). But I love the angle and free space beneath the laptop. Height is good to match my elevated monitor, great for adding a second screen! Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: johnnysausages

customer_reviews.title: Even Better Than I Imagined!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't know what to expect when I ordered this. I just knew I needed it with my new WFH status, because setting my laptop up on a printer box was getting old, fast. It's metal, it feels just like the same material a MacBook is made out of. It's thick and sturdy. I've been using a 13 in. MacBook Air and a 15 in. MacBook Pro on it. It's very stable and I'm not afraid of it falling off the table. If you've considered it, you won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: v

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a teacher & with distance learning & the amount of time I'm on the computer, I now have ganglion cyst on my wrist. I wanted a way to help with the pressure on my wrists. It does take some time getting used to typing directly on to your laptop while on the stand. It is the perfect height to have our Zoom meetings but I think I'm going to invest in a wireless keyboard because I'm not quite comfortable typing on my laptop while it's elevated. You can type on your laptop and it doesn't bounce around. It's extremely sturdy!!!
customer_reviews.author: M. Bocanegra

customer_reviews.title: The perfect stand for Macbook Pro
customer_reviews.text: I've used this for two different laptops now, the original Retina MacBook Pro (circa 2012) and the newer, thinner 2016 thunderbolt-3 MacBook Pro. Both fit perfectly. The mStand has some nice features, like the downward tilt, which elevates the laptop but keeps it from sliding backwards (and potentially off a desk), and grips so that metal never scrapes on metal. It also has grips on the bottom that keep the stand securely in place. The passthrough port on the back mimics that of older iMacs or Apple displays, with plastic encircling the opening so that cables don't rub against the metal. Plus it matches the MacBook Pro colors of silver or space gray, and looks darn good on a desk.
customer_reviews.author: T. G. Cline

customer_reviews.title: Should've bought it sooner!
customer_reviews.text: This stand is very sturdy and well built. It is minimalistic and the color matches my Macbook Pro perfectly. By having my laptop elevated, it helps keep my back and neck straight. By pairing the stand with wireless mouse and keyboard and external monitor made my workflow much more productive. The added cable management hole has a plastic ring inside to prevent cables from chaffing. Smooth and soft rubber pads are placed around the base of the stand as well as the platform and lip of the stand to protect your laptop from potentially getting scratched.
customer_reviews.author: HJ

customer_reviews.title: Perfect laptop stand!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this because I was getting pain in my neck and shoulders from working on my laptop. Pricier than I wanted to spend, but well worth it. I use it everyday now because I'm working from home, and this is saving my posture! It brings my laptop to eye level. I do use it with a separate mouse and keyboard, but it's a good setup at home.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: 4th time buying this product. Awesome in every way its built
customer_reviews.text: This is my 4th time buyung this item including 360 model in different colors This product is not only just beautiful but also helps you relieve back and shoulder pain. * just put your laptop on the stand, put your hands on the keyboard, relax your shoulder (zero pressure on shoulder because all the weight is on the keyboard/stand) and start typing Don't waste your back and shoulder!
customer_reviews.author: SML

customer_reviews.title: This product looks great but is probably not tall enough to be ergonomically ...
customer_reviews.text: This product looks great but is probably not tall enough to be ergonomically useful. Your eyes should be in line with the top of your screen and unless your sitting at a very low desk or very short this is going to need a book underneath to be at a 'healthy' height. It's still an extremely well made product and looks at home with a Macbook on top but I wish they would be realistic with the height most people need this to be.
customer_reviews.author: Burnt Out

customer_reviews.title: A metal design goes well with my laptop
customer_reviews.text: If your laptop has a camera at the bottom of the screen, it is difficult to maintain the focus, sometimes my fingers will dance around the screen while video conference. This laptop stand solves this problem by elevating the position of the laptop. (You may need a separate keyboard/mouse though). The silver metal color looks sharp, the angle is perfect, provides some space below for cables and accessories. A sturdy construct may survive for many years. A good investment.
customer_reviews.author: NC

customer_reviews.title: It's a stand for your laptop!
customer_reviews.text: This stand is very well made and looks really nice. The quality is superb. It matches the color of my space gray MacBook Pro. I doesn't draw as much heat away from my MacBook Pro as I would have thought, but maybe if I actually used a piece of copper or something to make physical contact it would. You'd think the box for a laptop stand would be big, but it's actually pretty compact as it fits the stand exactly. It comes with a neat catalog of other Rain Design products, but after you buy this, you will have already bought the best product!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Barber

customer_reviews.title: Gold is Rose Gold, not regular Gold
customer_reviews.text: The laptop stand itself is great. But be warned the Gold version is actually more like the Rose Gold color offering from Apple, not regular Gold. The pictures on the Amazon listing portray a regular Gold, so it's deceiving.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Flowers

customer_reviews.title: Keeps macbook nice and elevated while cool - bit wobbly still
customer_reviews.text: Does what it sets out to do for the most part. Keeps it off my wood desk that has several burn holes from over heating. Love how it is nice and elevated to when I need to use it while standing or sitting. One issue is that when I do type it while having my macbook is on it then it can be a bit more wobbly than I care for. Obviously can get around it by just using a regular keyboard on the desk but not sure how to make it more stable otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Rikk Caro

customer_reviews.title: Wasn't a believer, now I am
customer_reviews.text: I didn't really see the need for a stand like this, I've always been a guy who just uses my laptop by itself on my desk. I decided to take a risk and purchase this stand since it was so highly reviewed here on Amazon and I'm glad I did. I'm surprised at how much better it feels to look at my 13" MacBook Pro when it is raised up on this stand. My neck has been thanking me for days. The space grey color perfectly matches the MBP space grey as well. I would recommend this to anyone who's on the fence about a laptop stand. This thing looks and feels awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Bryce D.

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST THING I ORDERED ON AMAZON
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS THE BEST PURCHASE I HAVE MADE ON AMAZON THUS FAR. SO HAPPY WITH THE PRODUCT. VERY STURDY AND AWESOME. DUE TO THE COVID SITUATION HAD TO WORK FROM HOME LONG HOURS AND THIS COULD NOT BE A PERFECT ITEM TO USE FOR LONG HOURS ON THE COMPUTER AND HELPS MY CARPEL TUNNEL TREMENDOUSLY.
customer_reviews.author: Lina

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Product - Must Have for Working from Home on Macbook
customer_reviews.text: If you work with a Macbook Pro, you MUST get this stand (or another like it). I work on mine all day for work, and honestly couldn't imaging having to do that without my stand. I am in virtual meetings where my camera is needed, and this puts your face right the perfect position for the camera = no slouching. I have a sit/stand desk, and when I stand, it is also super comfortable. The only downside to this is that it is not very portable, but I just keep it at home so it doesn't matter to me.
customer_reviews.author: suzimoreland

customer_reviews.title: This held my laptop at odd viewing angle for me- could not use.
customer_reviews.text: Maybe I've completely missed the point, but this held my laptop screen at an unusable angle for me, and I had to return it. In all other respects, it is a solid product, being very well built and sturdy. It didn't move around on the desk or any other surfaces, held my laptop securely (it's 15.6" ), and is built to last. Had I been able to adjust it just a bit, it would have fit my needs beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: Shops-a-lot

customer_reviews.title: New Favorite
customer_reviews.text: I've had my eye on this laptop stand for probably over a year. I kept putting it in my cart and deleting it when I thought about the price. Yes, it is a tad bit expensive. However, it's worth it. That's my opinion anyway. I'm not the type of person that likes to come home from a full-time job and then work more in an environment that isn't setup properly. I'm all about the space I'm working in. It makes me feel better, reduces stress, and helps me stay focused. This laptop stand fits perfectly with my other components on my home workstation. I have it paired with a Dell XPS 15 so bigger laptops work fine.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Money!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! It definitely serves its purpose. I use this stand to support my Mac Air, although the stand seems to also be capable of holding larger laptops. The stand is very stable. The material is a sturdy, strong metal with a beautiful smooth silver finish. I also love that there is an opening in the back, center of the stand. This allows you to nearly run wires (USB cables, charger, etc). The stand does not take up a lot of space on the desk. This is definitely a plus! This product seems to be able to accommodate ANY laptop, but appears to be MADE for Macs. Perfect fit!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. B

customer_reviews.title: Use with Fan to Cool
customer_reviews.text: Used with 'AC Infinity MULTIFAN S4, Quiet 120mm USB Fan'. Was concerned that the fan would not do much since the stand is solid. Thought about buying a stand with slits, but was concerned about stability. I went this route and am glad I did. The fan cools the machine. The fan can be placed on the stand and the computer on the fan. Stable enough to type. The 140mm fan would be the better version for this setup.
customer_reviews.author: Scott W. Brians

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, sleek addition to your desk!
customer_reviews.text: This product looks like it could’ve been made by Apple! It’s gorgeous with a sleek, minimalist design and felt like it was made of quality construction, not cheap materials. I got the swivel version which was useful since I have a small and narrow work desk. Echoing others on here that the gold color is really a rose gold color, which I personally love but if you’re looking for a true gold then you might be disappointed. I’m very pleased with this purchase and only wish I had bought it sooner!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Saved my neck & gave extra desk real estate
customer_reviews.text: I have a Macbook Air 11”. This saved my neck (and real estate on my desk). I did have to raise it up in order to get the screen at eye level, but I love my set up. I found this acrylic drawer set that works perfectly with the mStand and provides extra storage. This was well worth the purchase. Pictures show the computer set up and then how storing the keyboard inside this gadget provides extra desktop real-estate for work without the computer. Love!!!
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Supports the MacBook Air nicely!
customer_reviews.text: the design of this laptop stand is good. it brings up the viewing angle of the laptop to a much comfortable level. there is sufficient space between the design to put the Bluetooth paired keyboard after using it. It is stable and comes with sufficient pads to protect the laptop from scratches when placed on the top. getting this version of the mStand is a good option as it helps in the sitting position too.
customer_reviews.author: Kent

customer_reviews.title: Takes care of all my work needs
customer_reviews.text: I do alot of things in my home office. I watch youtube, listen to music check emails and with this stand I can use my laptop in a position thats comfortable. It also leaves me space for external harddrives, my cac reader for work and plenty of other things..its really an awesome find that can double for other accessories. I use it as a stand for my camera and tripod (tripod as flexible legs that i put through the hole in the laptop stand)
customer_reviews.author: Jawara T Fragher

customer_reviews.title: even better than I thought
customer_reviews.text: the stand is rock solid. It consists of a single piece of metal with an elegant cut-out for cables. Although I didn't take the height at which the laptop would sit into account when I purchased this stand, it almost perfectly matches that of my DDJ-SX, so when I DJ my macbook pro and my controller almost look like they are part of one single machine. The stand also goes very well with my Apple Cinema Display.
customer_reviews.author: Johan Bollen

customer_reviews.title: Great for working on a desk
customer_reviews.text: When I use my MacBook Pro at home, I use a Bluetooth keyboard and trackpad. So I like to elevate the MBP to near eye level with this stand. It's really nice looking. And the Space Gray is a literally perfect match to my MBP. It's a beautiful aluminum and very ergonomic. Finally, it comes in a nice box that's reminiscent of Apple packaging. It's wonderful. If you use your MacBook Pro on a desk, you should really consider this.
customer_reviews.author: Michael the Skeptic

customer_reviews.title: Swivel Spins too Easily / Not Recommended for Larger Laptops.
customer_reviews.text: The concept is good but i can't use it with larger laptops. If you have a large laptop (17") then i don't recommend this for you. Another problem with this product is that is spins far to easily without a locking mechanism. So if you have a ethernet cord or power cable that slightly pulls or pushes it will cause the swivel to turn. Other than the its a nice design but these flaws are just to great to give more than 3 stars. If you get this product invest in a wireless keyboard it makes it that much better.
customer_reviews.author: Jung

customer_reviews.title: This is ROSE GOLD. But great product!
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely gorgeous sturdy and well-made but I want the potential purchasers to know it is not gold it is ROSE GOLD! Which for me personally was a good thing because that’s what I wanted but if you’re looking for more of a yellow toned gold it’s not that! That is why I gave it four stars because I feel as though the seller could be more specific! Otherwise it’s well made!
customer_reviews.author: Jodi Howe

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This puts my laptop at exactly the right height for me to use my laptop screen and then a portable keyboard and mouse converts my laptop. The one piece construction is sturdy, really sturdy. I like that it is the same color as my MacBook... It's like it was made for it. Is was, right? The rubber cushions are in the right place and prevent scratches. Overall, this is a great stand. I gave this 3 stars for portability. Its large and heavy which is PERFECT a permanent use in my office. If I'm need "portability," I just take my laptop with me. I wouldn't need this set up on the road.
customer_reviews.author: Tom M.

customer_reviews.title: Must have!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS THING. I’m a medical student and this lets me use my laptop and study for hours without cramping up my neck and shoulders from looking downwards
customer_reviews.author: Lizbeth Soltero

customer_reviews.title: ABSOLUTELY LOVE THIS STAND!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy that I bought this stand! I got a new Dell XPS 15 for Christmas and I was looking on Amazon for a cover for it and saw this stand. I looked at the pictures, read the description, and reviews and had to get one. This stand holds my laptop perfectly and it is completely secure. Now I can have my keyboard and DVD player on the cart with my laptop instead of in a box next to my chair. I absolutely LOVE this stand! I am so incredibly happy I bought it. I would recommend this stand to anyone wanting something like this.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Design & Quality
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough about this stand. I bought it to eliminate neck strain from viewing down at my MacBook. I had concerns about it being stable to trust my laptop on a stand. It is very heavy (so not for travel). It's beautifully designed just like the suite of Apple products that I love. There is no way my computer will fall or budge from the stand due to the rubber grippers. The opening in the back of the stand base allows for the cord to stay clear on your work surface. So many good things about this produce. It surpassed my expectations I highly recommend this to anyone who wants a high quality, well made stand.
customer_reviews.author: Katniss

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: So I used this for work a couple of years out (the swivel base one) and loved it. Since I am home often I decided to invest one of my own, but the stand with no swivel base. I really love it. It is sturdy, the perfect height and color. I would definitely recommend it to anyone. 1st Pic: side view 2nd Pic: front view 3rd Pic: bottom view
customer_reviews.author: SJH

customer_reviews.title: The Pinnacle of Laptop Stands
customer_reviews.text: Got myself a new Dell XPS 17, but could not find a decent laptop stand that can hold a 17 inch laptop. But this, this fits perfectly with my Dell XPS 17. the feet arrangement and the size are well designed and made versatile so that it can fit a variety of laptops. A solid block of Aluminum, sturdy and coherent design. The default rubber feet were a little too flat for my liking, so I customized with a Laptop Lift rubber feet to boost the bottom air intake. Very satisfied with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Planned Obsolescence

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy, good height
customer_reviews.text: I was previously using a stack of old college textbooks as a laptop stand -- this is much better. The laptop stays in place on the stand and the stand doesn't slide around on my desk. I like that the keyboard is slightly tilted downward for when I need to use the menu bar. It elevates the laptop screen just the right amount to help with posture and neck strain. Overall this has been a good investment for improving my WFH set-up.
customer_reviews.author: kjb

customer_reviews.title: Stable, quality anti-cat stand
customer_reviews.text: I just bought an expensive 14" laptop/tablet and the keyboard became an instant kitty freeway whenever I was on it. This stand is the perfect height and tilt to prevent paws on the keyboard. It's stable enough that bumps don't budge the laptop, and as a bonus, the hole in the back is fun to stick paws through to get furry mice underneath. It's a win for everyone, and I (and the cats) couldn't be happier. (well they might be happier to walk on the keyboard, but... no.)
customer_reviews.author: JanelleG

customer_reviews.title: Reluctant? Don’t be. Go for it.
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, beautiful, and so worth. It’s made to be at perfect height for any desk regardless of your height (I’ve tried this with plenty of friends of various heights). Since your laptop can be tilted at any angle, it makes viewing comfortable at any angle that best fits you. If you’re thinking about it, but is reluctant or skeptical - just go for it, you won’t regret it. I was reluctant at first and skeptical because it wasn’t adjustable but boy I was wrong because this piece was designed at a perfect height so you wouldn’t need to adjust it anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what is says...
customer_reviews.text: This stand matches my MacBook perfectly. It also puts my MacBook at the perfect height. So I credit this stand to the saving of my back. The aluminum used is high grade and I have seen no scratches or ware. When I bought this I was concern with the bottom of my MacBook getting scratched. Nope. Those tiny rubber pieces really do save your computer. I highly recommend this product to anyone who uses an external keyboard. Or sits at a desk for a long period of time and wants their back to not hurt anymore from looking down.
customer_reviews.author: Jonah Willis

customer_reviews.title: Feels a little expensive for what it is, but it does it's job well.
customer_reviews.text: I have space gray which matches my computer pretty well. It seems a shade lighter, but it barely shows so it doesn't bother me. It does a nice job of holding the computer , but do sort of wish I would have bought one where I could adjust the height. It's not a bad height but I move things around frequently so have some flexibility probably would have been a smarter choice. Since it is so expensive for just a fixed stand I can only give it 4 stars, but does feel premium, solid, and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Count Scotula

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop stand, crappy not true marketing
customer_reviews.text: I want to give it 5 stars so bad but I can't. The big feature is having it as a heatsink? Everyone with half a brain knows that is utter bull. Just check out Linus's video on this. That being said the 4 BUMPERS on the top and millimeters of CLEARANCE is nice. I had my MacBook running programs all night to give it the stress test and the surface was barely warm. Other than that it's a bit bigger than I thought it would be but I am rearranging my desk within the next month anyways so it will work just fine. And the space grey color matches perfectly with my 2016 MBP.
customer_reviews.author: Jp007

customer_reviews.title: Must have if you use your laptop for long periods.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely great stand. Perfect angle and height and very sturdy with a good weight so there is no chance of your laptop moving around while you type. This is a must have if you use your laptop for extended periods on your desk so you’re not hunched over at the screen. I use this as a “dock” next to a large monitor at home. 5 star rating on this product tells you it is worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ray El

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Stand
customer_reviews.text: Glad I bought this stand. It is so worth the money. I am now able to use my wireless mouse and keyboard with ease. I also have the option to just use the chromebook with more comfort in my wrist and hand position in using the built in keyboard on the chromebook. I plan to buy two more for my daughters to use for their chromebooks at their desk in their rooms.
customer_reviews.author: Aleisha S. James

customer_reviews.title: Rubber feet fall off
customer_reviews.text: The top side has 4 little rubber feet to hold the laptop off the surface. After a few months, the adhesive holding the feet started to let go and the feet started to fall off. This left a sticky residue on the surface that spread to the bottom side of the laptop. I periodically reset the feet, but the adhesive continued to degrade. Now all it does is leave the bottom of the laptop sticky.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Love this stand
customer_reviews.text: This is very sturdy, nice looking stand for your laptop. It holds my 15" 2018 MacBook Pro perfectly so that I can see the monitor & use the mouse easily, while I have the Mac plugged into an external 27" monitor & using a wireless Apple keyboard with num pad (+ sometimes, a wireless mouse). Company sent a catalog with the stand - all of their products looks pretty high-quality.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: The images and description are 100% accurate for the mStand Laptop Stand. Truth in advertising.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Definitely feel the ease of the strain on my neck from having to look down at my laptop to now having it at face level. The tension is gone and my posture is improved. Aesthetically pleasing as well. I bought the silver sand-grained color and it matches my HP laptop perfectly. Looks like an Apple product. Very durable and sturdy. Just an all around solid product. 10/10 would recommend and purchase again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: The Wiz

customer_reviews.title: Perfect solution for prolonged laptop use!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this stand!!! When set up I can see directly across, so no tilting my neck causing discomfort. Several reviews noted that it’s not sturdy when your typing on the laptop. If your just typing for a few minutes, it’s fine. However, you will be a lot more comfortable using a keyboard and mouse for typing.
customer_reviews.author: Rocky's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good stand but.....
customer_reviews.text: I like this stand a lot. It's well made, nicely designed and seems that it will last for the year(s) to come. With that being said....there are a few things that could be better: 1) It shouldn't be so MAC/Apple laptop specific (in terms of it's specifications/proportions) and features 2) (I've read this elsewhere too) - The height of the stand could be a few inches higher. This will allow for using an external keyboard while having the stand hover it. This will allow for using as little amount of desk space as possible while using external peripherals. Otherwise - you'll be happy with this stand
customer_reviews.author: Y. Allen

customer_reviews.title: Poorly Assembled (Even though this requires minimal assembly!)
customer_reviews.text: I got it because my room mate got his and said it was really great, it just came in the mail today and it's base is uneven and wobbly, I will be contacting customer support and keeping this review updated as of (11/4/17 1:00pm EST). It's frustrating to use because it moves the computer around while it wobbles. If you're gonna be paying close to $50 for something then it should function properly and be made well.
customer_reviews.author: Nihil Nomen

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop stand except it swivels easily.
customer_reviews.text: I really love this stand. I had been looking for a while, and then ran across this one on Amazon. It fits my laptop great. I have a bad neck and using my laptop on my desk and looking down some really was painful for me. So for more support for my neck I started looking for a stand and I found this one. The only problem is, it swivels real easily.
customer_reviews.author: Doreen Corke

customer_reviews.title: Gold
customer_reviews.text: It’s quite tall so consider the height of your desktop monitor if you’ll be working on dual screens. My desktop monitor isn’t adjustable is unfortunately a little lower. Also the stand is rose gold , not gold to my dismay.
customer_reviews.author: _x0j0

customer_reviews.title: If you have any type of MacBook, BUY THIS! DO IT NOW!!!
customer_reviews.text: First, kudos to Amazon for the amazing delivery speed. I was not expecting it as soon as they delivered. Anyway, it's made from a fairly solid sheet of aluminum and very sleek in appearance. I personally have the default stainless steel color, but it does come in Rose Gold and Space Gray, too. This is a must-have for any home office ensemble!
customer_reviews.author: sdmrco

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous and Ergonomic!
customer_reviews.text: I love this laptop riser! I purchased it to use at my job to help my desk setup be more ergonomic, and this is the perfect height for keeping my work at eye level, instead of looking down at the laptop all day. It is high quality metal, and looks so professional and sleek. I also love that it doesn't take up a bunch of space on my desk. I have lots of room to work and spread out all my papers. It is also compact enough to fit into the bottom drawer of my desk, which is about the size of one filing cabinet drawer. This was definitely a fantastic purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Julia Bledsoe

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend for anyone who works on their laptop!
customer_reviews.text: This saves my shoulders and back when working! I’ve been using this since working at home and definitely will need to bring it to the office when it opens back up. The only negative thing is my wrist gets sore after a while because it’s tilted at an angle, but this gives me a reminder to take a little break anyway. But it saves my back from being hunched over all day and I’ve noticed an improvement in the tightness of my neck and shoulders!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Strand

customer_reviews.title: Solid and Stable
customer_reviews.text: Great stand for my laptop - very sturdy and solid. The feature of being able to swivel is handy but swiveling around with cord connected to the laptop can be a problem. Great finish on the stand and raises the laptop screen 7 inches from the desk and the front of the keyboard is raised 3.5 inches for a nice angle for typing.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and elegant
customer_reviews.text: With COVID, I needed to improve my ergonomics and stop hunching over my laptop. This stand was recommended to me by a coworker, and it is excellent. The construction is so solid and it is the perfect, stylish accompaniment to my MacBook Pro. The space gray matches well. Highly recommend this stand!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Buy it
customer_reviews.text: Even though it does not adjust height, it sits at a very comfortable height for my 5'3'. Very well made, sturdy and there is not holders in the area where you wrist sits, which is great. Definitely helping keeping me from looking down getting neck and back aches.
customer_reviews.author: Ari Abreu

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It holds my laptop high enough so I can look straight ahead instead of down all day while I work. The product I purchased has the swivel option and I think this was such a great addition to add because as I shift my chair, add things to my desk for immediate projects I can swivel and shift my computer easily to accommodate my new direction. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works Perfectly for iPad Pro as a stand.
customer_reviews.text: I used to use it as a stand for my MacBook Pro but sold it and switched to iPad Pro. But i didn’t want to sell my stand. So I use stand as you can see in the pictures plus I can actually put it on top and use it for drawing. It works great that way as well. For iPad and MacBook pro its a perfect purchase and mind you I have been using this for almost 10 years. So this product lasts for years as well.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Grigorian

customer_reviews.title: Immediately improve productivity and eliminate desk clutter
customer_reviews.text: This product effectively completes the aesthetics of my workstation while providing unparalleled functionality. I'm really not quite sure what other users are complaining about in regards to the rubber feet falling off, the overall build quality is extremely sturdy - my MacBook never budges from its perch despite hours of use every day. The elevation and angle of the stand allows for prolonged ergonomic usage and prevents your wrists from being grated on the sharp edges of the MacBooks. Having a permanent nest for your laptop is a game-changer and it has opened up a lot of room. My co-workers have all decided to purchase one for their office spaces after seeing me use mine.
customer_reviews.author: Grant Hobar

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop stand
customer_reviews.text: I use this when I travel to our other office, I am only there one day a week, so I dont have my big screen setup and docking station there. I use this to raise the laptop so I can see it better and I dont have to strain my neck looking down to the desk. I got a wireless keyboard to use so Im not awkwardly typing on the laptop on the stand. Looks great.
customer_reviews.author: J. Vin

customer_reviews.title: Solid, stable and aesthetically pleasing
customer_reviews.text: This stand is great to look at and is very well made. I needed something to make my Macbook Air a bit more ergonomic during the COVID-19 quarantine, and it lifts it up just great, making video conferences look a bit more professional, and allows me not to hunch over so much.
customer_reviews.author: M. Winterroth

customer_reviews.title: Excellent & Stable Laptop Stand
customer_reviews.text: The stand is incredibility well built. Supports a 2015 15' MacBook Pro well and does not exhibit wobble when typing on a Bluetooth keyboard; note that "wobble" would also be impacted by the stability of the surface (desk) the stand and keyboard are resting on. The color of the stand matches the silver MacBook line quite well. There are rubber bumpers for the laptop to rest on and rubber strips at the lip of the stand which prevents the laptop from scratching. Overall, an excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: pxm

customer_reviews.title: This is ROSE gold and not the regular gold...image is wrong
customer_reviews.text: I purchased based on the image and it shows that the stand is gold. Even the box just says Gold, but it is far from matching the laptop.
customer_reviews.author: jaredean

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy stand, great for cable management
customer_reviews.text: The product is super sturdy and high quality. I originally wanted an adjustable stand, but opted for this for stability and due to the good reviews. The height is pretty ergonomically optimal already for my setup, and I like that I can hide cables behind it. I’m also able to store a dock under it. Really helps a lot with limited desk space, and is a lot better than the box I was previously using.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Must have!
customer_reviews.text: In the zoom life we now live, this is a must. No more having people look up our nose. It makes you level with your laptop or iPad.
customer_reviews.author: StegeFam

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to return this item and missed the window so i am now stuck with it.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't like this product at all. The tilt of it is not adjustable nor is the height. It didn't work for me at all.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Teitelbaum

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice and does the job.
customer_reviews.text: Makes using the laptop on a desk much easier. Lifts the screen and moves it closer to you. The 360 swivel works great in my opinion. That might not be something everyone would appreciate, but for my set up it’s much appreciated. I typical use this paired with a Bluetooth keyboard & mouse, but it’s fairly comfortable to type on the laptop as normal on the stand also.
customer_reviews.author: james

customer_reviews.title: 10 Years in
customer_reviews.text: I bought this July 2010... It popped up as a recommended product, and I clicked on it out of curiosity to see if it's still the same product, it definitely is. The design is basically the same, the rubber pad shape has changed a little. The only option that has changed is the colors, it was only Silver available back then. I've used it 5 days a week for 10 years with 3 different MacBook Pros and it looks as good as new (minus the dust).
customer_reviews.author: throk

customer_reviews.title: Clean, minimal design
customer_reviews.text: I love this laptop stand. I originally purchased for my Macbook at home and liked it so much that when I found out that I would be switching over to a Macbook at work, I requested this stand for my work desk as well. It's sleek and I like the open design so that I can store things under it -- I don't move my laptop much at home, so I keep my external hard drive stored under there and can easily plug it in to backup. It's sturdy, I've never had an issue with accidentally hitting my laptop and worrying about it going off balance.It's non-obtrusive and takes up very little footprint on the desk (to me at least).
customer_reviews.author: Hi.

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: After a year, still love it. Perfect match of metal and texture. Fits my 15"and my 13" equally well. The only way I could see this letting you down is if you are hoping it will put the screen at eye level. You'll still be looking downward a bit (assuming standard desk and chair heights). However my 15" sits at a great height to vertically center it with my 27" thunderbolt monitor. So I'm very satisfied in that way since I use both screens at once.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pesky Macbook not at a good angle then snag this
customer_reviews.text: My macbook has yet to fall over and this allows me to store extra stuff underneath bringing my desk clutter to a whole nother level. Study, holds the laptop at a great angle, would definitely recommend to someone asking for a macbook stand.
customer_reviews.author: I-Review-Things

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't shake, good height for me.
customer_reviews.text: Best thing about this stand is that there is virtually no wobble while you're typing or moving around at your desk. Other than that, the height is find. The space underneath is a great spot to stash your keyboard if you need the additional space for a second, which is important in my small living area.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Compton

customer_reviews.title: High quality stand
customer_reviews.text: This is a great, solid stand. I was looking for a more lightweight stand so I exchanged it for their portable stand. If you want a sold stand though that you know your laptop won’t falll off is this is awesome. I’ve tried a couple of different stands and this is by far the best constructed and high quality. Highly recommend this product. Will easily hold a 15 inch laptop and 13 as well. Well with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Jennapher TvM

customer_reviews.title: Best thing I’ve ever bought for my desk!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this thing! I don’t get neck or upper back pain when working on my laptop all day now. It gives me more room on my desk and a convenient place to store stuff. Keeps my desk neater! Everyone should have one of these!
customer_reviews.author: Greg Blake

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, good angle
customer_reviews.text: Hey, it’s a very simple but functional and well built laptop stand. Keeps my MacBook at a good working angle with storage below for an external keyboard. No adjustments or setup required. My son saw it on a trip home and really liked it. So, Dad bought him one also:).
customer_reviews.author: Don Eastman

customer_reviews.title: Clean, simple, quality
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazed with the quality of this stand. From the packaging to the finish of the metal. Hands down would buy again, even for a gift! If you have to think twice about purchasing this, I hope this review could help you out. Product is a 10/10
customer_reviews.author: Al Chodown

customer_reviews.title: Really great stand for MacBook
customer_reviews.text: I bought this stand to use with my 13 inch MacBook Pro very sturdy design I have a wireless keyboard and mouse I use with my MacBook but if I’m just typing up something quick I use the MacBooks own keyboard and it is very stable when I type that was my one concern when I was thinking about getting this stand but it works great. The metal is really good and quality is on par with Apple design it looks good with other Apple products.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Sheets

customer_reviews.title: I was really pleased to see a swivel option
customer_reviews.text: I was in the market for a new stand for my desk, came across this option and went with it. I was really pleased to see a swivel option. The stand is well made, very attractive and looks incredibly similar to an Apple designed product. Obviously, it will work well with any brand of notebook but it sure looks great with my MacBook! The swivel design is a nice touch, it isn't too loose so that it moves too easily, but it is effortless to move when needed. Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: My second purchase, and it's still very good!
customer_reviews.text: I bought one for myself three years ago with Space Gray and I loved it. And I just bought another one for my girlfriend in Silver. It is super sturdy and the way it is made is extremely nice. Although it's a bit pricey, but i think it is well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Simon

customer_reviews.title: Nice but expensive
customer_reviews.text: I would say it’s a beautiful stand. Especially if you have a silver Mac it matches your laptop. I bought it because it will cool down my Mac as well. It does it’s job but you can always find a cheeper option if you’re only looking for something to cool off your laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Rui M.

customer_reviews.title: Very well made and nice looking
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my wife to use since she is a teacher and in working online about half the time. It is very nice looking and sturdy, works great, and when combined with a bluetooth keyboard, has reduced her neck strain.
customer_reviews.author: Jono

customer_reviews.title: Does Exactly What It's Supposed To Do!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stand. I was debating over the swivel versus that non-swivel and chose the non-swivel because I really will not be turning it. The stand is light weight, very stable, sleek and well-made. Matches my space grey MacBook Pro perfectly. Helps me to stay sitting straight in my chair. Well worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: AZ Pete

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, elegant, and extremely well designed.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for use with my 2012 MBP 15". The stand itself is very simple, yet really well made. Bumper pads at the front on the raised ledge and under the computer ensure that it doesn't get scratched. It's perfectly matched to the color of my MBP, and it puts it at a perfect height relative to my external display (27" TB Display). Even the packaging felt almost Apple-esque. The raised lip that the computer rests against has a slot in it so you can easily open the display via the groove in the front of the MBP. I was skeptical and stubborn, not wanting to pay that much for a simple stand, but I'm glad I did.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a MacBook Pro
customer_reviews.text: I love this laptop stand! It's the perfect height to raise my MacBook Pro to the proper level while sitting or standing at my desk. I use a bluetooth keyboard with my laptop, and having the keyboard at an angle takes up less desk space and allows faster and more accurate access to the touch bar and the touch ID sensor. Overall this laptop stand is excellent quality and I'm happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: M. Giguere

customer_reviews.title: Well made, great color match to the Apple MacBook Pro. Perfect height!
customer_reviews.text: Well made, perfect color match to my MacBook Pro. I got this so I could use a keyboard because the MacBook Pro 2016 has the crappiest keyboard on the planet, and literally 5 or six keys stick all the time. Only Apple would reinvent the keyboard and break it in the name of making a laptop another mm thinner. Now with this stand I can use the laptops screen as a second monitor and use a keyboard that actually works.
customer_reviews.author: Mr  Slice

customer_reviews.title: Spendy but worth it (13" MacBook Air)
customer_reviews.text: Didn't want to cheap out on a good stand. I work in three different school buildings and using a laptop is killing my neck and upper back. I am very impressed by the size and sturdiness of this stand. Based off of the pictures I thought It would be much smaller; it holds my 13" MacBook Air like it's nothing. Pads on the unit ensure my laptop won't get scratched and ensure the unit doesn't move. You can type on it in a pinch, but I've ordered a wireless keyboard to make things easier on my wrists. I was not excited to spend so much on it.... but now I feel like I got my money's worth.
customer_reviews.author: A.B.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this item is quality!! Packaging was very secure. After unboxing it, I noted that the stand has a nice weight to it. I was dealing with some minor wrist pain that's actually alleviated when I type on the MacBook keyboard while it's mounted instead of on the Magic Keyboard. Either way, it not only adds a dimension of refinement to my current setup, but it also functions exceptionally. 5 stars from me any day.
customer_reviews.author: Zamansky

customer_reviews.title: Excellent stand for MacBook Pro 15” 2017 model
customer_reviews.text: This stand is well designed and holds my 2017 MacBook Pro 15” very well allowing me opportunities for various wires to go under and through openings. Allows for a close enough view of the screen even while using a magic keyboard. I’m using an external 4K monitor as well and the stand accommodates that very well. Highly recommend it and especially for the price it’s quite attractive while being unassuming.
customer_reviews.author: BusyBuyer

customer_reviews.title: Just what it should be
customer_reviews.text: Does just what it should with no fuss. Opened the package, put it on my desk and put my laptop on it and I was good to go. Nothing to install or assemble. Holds my Dell laptop securely at a good angle. Swivels easily if I need it but stay put otherwise. I use it with a separate keyboard and mouse so I don't need to touch the laptop. If I did I might find the swivel too much. I got the swivel so I could show the screen easily if I need to. Looks good too, clean lines.
customer_reviews.author: maxiff

customer_reviews.title: Very great and effective!
customer_reviews.text: As a student in H.S. that is constantly doing assignments and such, this laptop stand has definitely come in handy. I have had the stand for about a week and can for sure see a major difference with myself and my laptop. As for myself, my posture has gotten better because I was always hunched over when I would work on my laptop. Now as for my laptop, it is for sure not heating up quickly as it used to and also not having that annoying fan sound! Would for sure recommend this to my friends that are having the same problems that I used to have! Thank you :)
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn Ramos

product_meta.title: mStand Laptop Stand
product_meta.description: Color:Silver| Style:mStandDesigned to uplift. Made of a single sturdy piece of aluminum, mStand transforms your laptop into a stylish workstation with its elegant curves and silver-anodized finish. The single piece design solidly holds a laptop while the aluminum panel acts a heat sink to keep the laptop cool. A cable hole in the back of the stand routes wires to reduce clutter. Ergonomics Long-term use of a laptop as the main computing device can strain the body as the user hunches down to see the screen and type. mStand raises the screen 5.9 inches (150 mm) to meet the user's eye level, thus promoting better posture, while its tilt design brings the screen closer for easier viewing. With an external keyboard andmouse, mStand creates an ideal ergonomic desktop setup for laptop users. Compatible with all sizes of Apple MacBook, MacBook Pro. Also fits most 14" standard PC and 15" widescreen PC with depths not more than 10.4 inches.
feature_bullets: Raises notebook screen height to eye level for better ergonomics (5.9 inches).
Single piece aluminum design provides solid stability and acts as a heat sink to cool laptop
The back cable management hole is 2 inches in diameter. Cable organizer behind routes wires neatly
Sand-blasted and silver anodized finish matches Apple notebooks. Keyboard stash clears up desk area when not in use
Compatible with Apple Macbook Pro, Macbook Air and other laptops with depths less than 10.4 inches

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars6,383 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
